name: Phases (itch) (aerica)
description:
Light and shadow... The visible and the invisible... Seen and perceived...

Consider how the sun's movement moves us from day to night,
consider the instance of time, and
consider imposition and the appearance of visible and invisible surfaces
within spaces that are physical, digital, and virtual.

INSTRUCTIONS:
Please wear a VR headset.
Change your perspective.

Note: This was designed in Unity with Steam VR.
